competition_summary.context: competition in our electric and natural gas markets from retail choice and alternative electric suppliers, and continued industry consolidation; • The timely completion of capital projects within budgets and the ability to recover the related costs through rates; • The impact of changing expectations and demands of our customers, regulators, investors, and other stakeholders, including focus on environmental, social, and governance concerns; • The risk of delays and shortages, and increased cost
